articles.description: France striker Kylian Mbappe says he will leave Paris St-Germain at the end of the season.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: PSG striker announces he will leave the French champions at end of season

articles.description: Chelsea boss Mauricio Pochettino says "two parties" must agree on his future at the end of the season.
articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino: Chelsea sacking would 'not be a problem'

articles.description: England coach Brendon McCullum holds talks with leading wicket-taker James Anderson about the veteran's future.
articles.title: James Anderson: England bowler's future in doubt after talks with Brendon McCullum

articles.description: Novak Djokovic is hit on the head by a water bottle as he signs autographs after his win at the Italian Open.
articles.title: Italian Open: Novak Djokovic hit by bottle after win over Corentin Moutet

articles.description: Como gain promotion into Serie A to end a 21-year absence from the top-flight of Italian football
articles.title: Como end 21-year Serie A absence with Cosenza draw

articles.description: Manchester United midfielder Casemiro is left out of Brazil's squad for next month's Copa America.
articles.title: Brazil Copa America squad: Casemiro, Richarlison, Gabriel Jesus and Antony left out

articles.description: Ireland clinch just their second win over Pakistan with a thrilling five-wicket victory in the first T20 at a sun-kissed Clontarf on Frday.
articles.title: Ireland stun Pakistan with victory in Clontarf opener

articles.description: German champions Bayer Leverkusen offer fans free club tattoos to commemorate their title-winning season and record unbeaten run.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen to offer fans free tattoos after Bundesliga title win

articles.description: Britain's Daryll Neita beats American Tamari Davis to claim victory in the women's 100m at the Diamond League meeting in Doha.
articles.title: Diamond League: Britain's Neita wins women's 100m in Doha

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says there is "no strain" in his relationship with Tiger Woods but admits they do not "see eye-to-eye" on the sport's future.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy denies fall-out with Tiger Woods over future of golf
